songs.title: Everytime (Above & Beyond’s Club Mix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Take my hand

[Bridge]
And this song's my sorry
And this song's my sorry
And this song's my sorry

[Verse 1]
Take my hand

[Bridge]
And this song's my sorry
And this song's my sorry
And this song's my sorry

[Verse 1]
Take my hand
